title: Safe at Work
cleaned_text: Safe at Work Safe at Work We are committed to supporting a safe environment to work and shop, and we believe the COVID-19 vaccine plays a critical role in those efforts. Please use this application to verify your vaccination status and help us continue safeguarding our customers and each other. We are committed to supporting a safe environment to work and shop, and we believe the COVID-19 vaccine plays a critical role in those efforts. Please use this application to verify your vaccination status and help us continue safeguarding our customers and each other. We are not requiring our contractors to provide proof of vaccination at this time and/or via this application. Contractor personnel should contact their employer with respect to the matter of vaccination and/or proof of vaccination requirements, if applicable.
